name: Felix Leiter
description: Felix Leiter is an American CIA agent and James Bond's trusted ally in Casino Royale, providing assistance in Bond's mission against Le Chiffre.

content.title: Background
content.body: Felix Leiter serves as an operative for the Central Intelligence Agency (CIA) and functions as a liaison and field contact for James Bond. His American spy background complements Bond’s British intelligence expertise, creating a transatlantic collaboration against common threats. Felix's presence illustrates the crucial and often intertwined cooperation between allied intelligence services during the Cold War period. In Casino Royale, he is dispatched to aid Bond in his high-stakes gambling mission to neutralize Le Chiffre’s financial influence.

content.title: Personality
content.body: Felix Leiter exhibits a confident, affable personality tempered by a solid professionalism characteristic of an experienced field agent. He is portrayed as reliable and straightforward, often providing a grounded, pragmatic perspective compared to Bond’s sometimes impulsive tendencies. Leiter’s American charm and frankness well complement his sharp intelligence and loyalty, establishing him as a valuable and trustworthy collaborator.

content.title: Story Role
content.body: Felix plays a pivotal supporting role in Casino Royale, helping James Bond navigate the complexities of the mission and operate effectively in unfamiliar environments. His aid ranges from tactical support to sharing intelligence, providing both practical and moral support in the tense poker game against Le Chiffre. His character highlights international cooperation in espionage and is instrumental in advancing Bond’s success and survival.

content.title: Relationships
content.body: Felix shares a strong professional and personal friendship with James Bond grounded in mutual respect and camaraderie. Their alliance underscores the partnership between British MI6 and the CIA. While not delved into deeply in Casino Royale, Felix also maintains confidential links with other American intelligence personnel and operates under the guidance of CIA leadership. His bond with Bond establishes trust and cooperation significant to the narrative.

content.title: Abilities/Skills
content.body: Felix Leiter displays proficiency in espionage tactics, firearms, close combat, and field operations typical of CIA agents. His skills include intelligence gathering, surveillance, and tactical planning. His robust physicality and quick decision-making assist Bond during dangerous encounters. Leiter's American training provides a complementary skillset and tactical perspective to Bond's own capabilities, enhancing their combined effectiveness.
